title: New to Jungle who to learn
body: Hey so I am going to start jungling. I play in the mid ellos with my friends and we need someone else to jungle when our main is out. Which 2 champions would be good to learn that are not to hard to get used to in the jungle and aren't completely useless. I have previously played Amumu and Nunu in the jungle. I also like shyvanna top but I am not sure how she would do in the jungle. Thanks

replies.body: Her ganks are relatively weak, I have found pretty solid success ganking through the lane bushes with Dragon's Descent, she depends a lot on follow up, but it CAN work if you get chilling smite and frozen mallet (Although frozen mallet can be an expensive buy.)

i dont play jungle much, only when im forced.

ive had the best success with udyr, very easy to play and pretty easy to gank with.
Watch Trick2g, especially his old "How to Gank My Way" vids where he plays Volibear.

Shyvana actually does extremely well in the jungle if you want to take her in because you're familiar with her, start with burnout, than max out burn out first followed by twin bite. (I'm assuming that's the same for top lane Shyvana).
It depends on the lane but ya burnout is strong in lane. I just thought her ganks were supposed to be pretty weak
Thanks Ill give them a look over.

Try,

Vi and Pantheon.

Easy to learn and very good team fights
